Heading: Publisher’s corporate website
Note: See also codes 17 and 18

Heading: Publisher’s website for a specified work
Note: A publisher’s informative and/or promotional webpage relating to a specified work (book, journal, online resource or other publication type)

Heading: Online hosting service home page
Note: A webpage giving access to an online content hosting service as a whole

Heading: Journal home page
Note: A webpage giving general information about a serial, in print or electronic format or both

Heading: Online resource ‘available content’ page
Note: A webpage giving direct access to the content that is available online for a specified resource version. Generally used for content available online under subscription terms

Heading: Contributor’s own website
Note: A webpage maintained by an author or other contributor about her/his publications and personal background

Heading: Publisher’s website relating to specified contributor
Note: A publisher’s webpage devoted to a specific author or other contributor

Heading: Other publisher’s website relating to specified contributor
Note: A webpage devoted to a specific author or other contributor, and maintained by a publisher other than the publisher of the item described in the ONIX record

Heading: Third-party website relating to specified contributor
Note: A webpage devoted to a specific author or other contributor, and maintained by a third party (eg a fan site)

Heading: Contributor’s own website for specified work
Note: A webpage maintained by an author or other contributor and specific to an individual work

Heading: Other publisher’s website relating to specified work
Note: A webpage devoted to an individual work, and maintained by a publisher other than the publisher of the item described in the ONIX record

Heading: Third-party website relating to specified work
Note: A webpage devoted to an individual work, and maintained by a third party (eg a fan site)

Heading: Contributor’s own website for group or series of works
Note: A webpage maintained by an author or other contributor and specific to a group or series of works

Heading: Publisher’s website relating to group or series of works
Note: A publisher’s webpage devoted to a group or series of works

Heading: Other publisher’s website relating to group or series of works
Note: A webpage devoted to a group or series of works, and maintained by a publisher other than the publisher of the item described in the ONIX record

Heading: Third-party website relating to group or series of works (eg a fan site)
Note: A webpage devoted to a group or series of works, and maintained by a third party (eg a fan site)

Heading: Publisher’s B2B website
Note: Use instead of code 01 to specify a publisher’s website for trade users

Heading: Publisher’s B2C website
Note: Use instead of code 01 to specify a publisher’s website for end customers (consumers)

Heading: Author blog
Note: For example, a Blogger or Tumblr URL, a Wordpress website or other blog URL

Heading: Web page for author presentation / commentary
Web page for full content
Note: Use this value in the <Website> composite (typically within <Publisher> or <SupplyDetail>) when sending a link to a webpage at which a digital product is available for download and/or online access

Heading: Web page for other commentary / discussion
Transfer-URL
Note: URL needed by the German National Library for direct access, harvesting and storage of an electronic resource

Heading: DOI Website Link
Note: Link needed by German Books in Print (VLB) for DOI registration and ONIX DOI conversion

Heading: Supplier’s corporate website
Note: A corporate website operated by a distributor or other supplier (not the publisher)

Heading: Supplier’s B2B website
Note: A website operated by a distributor or other supplier (not the publisher) and aimed at trade customers

Heading: Supplier’s B2C website
Note: A website operated by a distributor or other supplier (not the publisher) and aimed at consumers

Heading: Supplier’s website for a specified work
Note: A distributor or supplier’s webpage describing a specified work

Heading: Supplier’s B2B website for a specified work
Note: A distributor or supplier’s webpage describing a specified work, and aimed at trade customers

Heading: Supplier’s B2C website for a specified work
Note: A distributor or supplier’s webpage describing a specified work, and aimed at consumers

Heading: Supplier’s website for a group or series of works
Note: A distributor or supplier’s webpage describing a group or series of works

Heading: URL of full metadata description
Note: For example an ONIX or MARC record for the product, available online

Heading: Social networking URL for specific work or product
Note: For example, a Facebook, Google+ or Twitter URL for the product or work

Heading: Author’s social networking URL
Note: For example, a Facebook, Google+ or Twitter page

Heading: Publisher’s social networking URL
Note: For example, a Facebook, Google+ or Twitter page

Heading: Social networking URL for specific article, chapter or content item
Note: For example, a Facebook, Google+ or Twitter page. Use only in the context of a specific content item (eg within <ContentItem>)

Heading: Publisher’s or third party website for permissions requests
Note: For example, a service offering click-through licensing of extracts

Heading: Publisher’s or third party website for privacy statement
Note: For example, a page providing details related to GDPR. For use in ONIX 3.0 only
